text: Rohit Gurunath Sharma (born 30 April, 1987) is an Indian cricketer. He is the captain of Mumbai Indians in Indian Premier League and he won IPLs 2013, 2015, 2017, 2019, 2020 and Champions League Twenty20s 2011 and 2013 with them, making him one of the most successful MI captains in the IPL, and also he won ICC World Twenty20 2007 and ICC Champions Trophy 2013 as a player in the Indian cricket team under MS Dhoni as the captain, also he won ICC World Twenty20 2024, ICC Champions Trophy 2025 as the captain himself, making him one of the most successful captains in the history of Indian cricket. Rohit Sharma is also known for his six hitting capabilities and is considered as one of the best white ball cricketers ever. == References == ==Other websites== * Rohit Sharma from Cricbuzz Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Indian cricketers Category:Marathi people
title: Rohit Sharma
